sourceMap.description: Set to true to produce a source map.

outputFileName.description: The relative path to the desired output file name.

inputFiles.description: One or more relative file names to bundle.

minify.description: Set to true to create a minified file of the bundle output.

includeInProject.description: Set to true to include the output file in the project. Doesn't work in some Visual Studio project types like ASP.NET 5 applications.
